attributes.action: To consider the unworkable extra charges on weighing our rubbish in our bins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Did you really think up this stupid idea to impose extra charges on our rubbish ! dont you consider that we have had enough of your ever increasing
laws and taxes in this country's will only end up clearing fly-tipping and cost you more in the long run this silly idea is unworkable in practise and will never work you seem to enjoy
upsetting the people who voted you in with law after law well we are sick of it we dont want tax on rubbish.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
